alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Walton County through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 458 PM EDT/358 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Santa Rosa Beach, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Inlet Beach, Portland, Port Washington, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, Seagrove Beach and Seaside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; South Walton
